meanings.definition: A small amount of food eaten between meals.
meanings.sent1: I always carry snacks in my bag for when I get hungry.
meanings.sent2: After school, I like to have some snacks while watching TV.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks my snacks are for her too, so she always tries to steal them.
meanings.sent4: The snacks at the party disappeared in a blink of an eye.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked snacks filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: I like to snacks on fruits when I feel peckish.
meanings.sent2: She snacks on chips while studying for her exams.
meanings.sent3: He snacks on cookies like they're going out of style.
meanings.sent4: The kids always snacks on popcorn during movie nights.
meanings.sent5: Snacking on nuts is a healthy way to curb hunger between meals.
